statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_amount, target_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(sale_id) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 10;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > target_amount ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 101 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC, sale_date ASC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount < target_amount AND product_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT sales_date, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY sales_date;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT sales_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_amount DESC, sales_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT target_amount, target_date FROM sales_targets WHERE target_amount < 5000 ORDER BY target_date DESC
SELECT sales_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sales_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date < CURRENT_DATE
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, total_sales FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM SalesForecasts WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecasted_sales FROM SalesForecasts ORDER BY forecasted_sales DESC;
SELECT sale_date, product_id, quantity_sold FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT sale_date, product_id, total_sales FROM SalesData WHERE total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date;
SELECT s.forecast_date, s.product_id, f.forecasted_sales FROM SalesForecasts AS f INNER JOIN SalesData AS s ON f.product_id = s.product_id WHERE f.forecasted_sales > 5000 ORDER BY f.forecast_date;

SELECT s.forecast_date, s.product_id, s.quantity_sold, f.forecasted_sales FROM SalesData AS s LEFT JOIN SalesForecasts AS f ON s.product_id = f.product_id AND s.sale_date = f.forecast_date WHERE f.forecast_id IS NULL ORDER BY s.sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data
SELECT date, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data JOIN product_catalog ON sales_data.product_id = product_catalog.product_id
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT date, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY date
SELECT p.product_name, s.sales_amount FROM product_catalog p JOIN sales_history s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.date = '2022-09-30'

SELECT ph.date, pc.product_name, st.target_amount FROM sales_history ph JOIN product_catalog pc ON ph.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN sales_targets st ON ph.product_id = st.product_id AND ph.date = st.target_date
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_name, sales_date, sales_amount FROM SalesTargets ORDER BY target_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, forecast_amount FROM SalesForecast WHERE forecast_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, product_name, performance_date FROM SalesPerformance WHERE performance_amount > 1000 AND performance_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM SalesHistory WHERE history_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY history_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM SalesTargets WHERE product_name = 'Product A' ORDER BY target_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(forecast_amount) AS total_forecast FROM SalesForecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT AVG(performance_amount) AS avg_performance FROM SalesPerformance WHERE performance_date > '2022-09-01';
SELECT product_name, MAX(history_amount) AS max_sales FROM SalesHistory GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY max_sales DESC;
